description.ko: 최첨단 기술과 네온으로 물든 도시 지하세계의 거친 분위기가 어우러진 미래형 대도시를 가로지르는 숨막히는 시네마틱 여정입니다.
description.en: A breathtaking cinematic journey through a futuristic metropolis where high-tech living meets the gritty atmosphere of a neon-drenched urban underworld.

prompt: Cinematic shot of a sprawling cyberpunk city, heavy rain, glowing neon signs in magenta and cyan, towering skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, flying vehicles weaving through dense urban architecture, hyper-detailed, 8k, Ray tracing, synthwave aesthetic, cinematic lighting
